home.parrafo-info: With experience in developing web systems using PHP and Laravel, as well as creating dynamic websites and applications.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
This is my real name hehe, I graduated in Computer Engineering and I continue to develop my skills through online courses and real projects in various areas.
I consider myself an empathetic and enthusiastic person, with skills focused on teamwork, assertive communication and problem solving. Furthermore, I am responsible and proactive, always willing to learn from others and continually improve myself.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.title-proyecto1: CNS inventory management and control system
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Made with PHP and the Laravel Framework for the Yacuiba District Health Box
proyectos.info-proyecto2: Made with PHP and the Laravel framework aimed at industrial plant García and Jaramillo.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: Control of money loans with cash closure per day and with weekly or monthly reports.
proyectos.info-proyecto4: System for Human Resources, Assistance Control, Reports and Permits. García and Jaramillo Industrial Plant.
proyectos.info-proyecto5: Website for Youth Ministry 517 of the U.C.E. New life.
proyectos.info-proyecto6: Informative website on the spiritual retirement organized by Sub Directive 24 UCE.
proyectos.info-proyecto7: Website for the Regional Youth Committee of the Gran Chaco belonging to the U.C.E. (Currently under development).
proyectos.info-proyecto8: Mobile robot, assembly with wooden base, Arduino One, Bluetooth HC-05 module, HC-SR04 ultrasonic sensor.
proyectos.info-proyecto9: Smart house, made with Arduino. Control of lights, door and sensors from APP downloaded from PlayStore.
proyectos.info-proyecto10: Final project of the subject of network programming technology (TPR) 2021.
proyectos.info-proyecto11: Practice applying knowledge and techniques of HTML and CSS in an unofficial site.
proyectos.info-proyecto12: Personal web, where some of my projects, my technical skills and a little about my training are found.
